Class: Carousel

Carousel(carouselopt)

Class for initializing and constructing Carousel with chainable interface.

Constructor

new Carousel(carouselopt)

Constructor for Carousel. Accepts optional Carousel to clone or list of items to copy.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
carousel Carousel | Array.<OptionItem> <optional>
 Either a carousel to clone or an array of OptionItem to initialize a new carousel
